Now these were the sons<S>1121</S> of David<S>1732</S>, which were born<S>3205</S> unto him in Hebron<S>2275</S>; the firstborn<S>1060</S> Amnon<S>550</S>, of Ahinoam<S>293</S> the Jezreelitess<S>3159</S>; the second<S>8145</S> Daniel<S>1840</S>, of Abigail<S>26</S> the Carmelitess<S>3762</S>: <sup>Daniel: or, Chileab 2Sam.3.3.</sup>
The third<S>7992</S>, Absalom<S>53</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Maachah<S>4601</S> the daughter<S>1323</S> of Talmai<S>8526</S> king<S>4428</S> of Geshur<S>1650</S>: the fourth<S>7243</S>, Adonijah<S>138</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Haggith<S>2294</S>:
The fifth<S>2549</S>, Shephatiah<S>8203</S> of Abital<S>37</S>: the sixth<S>8345</S>, Ithream<S>3507</S> by Eglah<S>5698</S> his wife<S>802</S>.
These six<S>8337</S> were born<S>3205</S> unto him in Hebron<S>2275</S>; and there he reigned<S>4427</S> seven<S>7651</S> years<S>8141</S> and six<S>8337</S> months<S>2320</S>: and in Jerusalem<S>3389</S> he reigned<S>4427</S> thirty<S>7970</S> and three<S>7969</S> years<S>8141</S>.
And these were born<S>3205</S> unto him in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>; Shimea<S>8092</S>, and Shobab<S>7727</S>, and Nathan<S>5416</S>, and Solomon<S>8010</S>, four<S>702</S>, of Bathshua<S>1340</S> the daughter<S>1323</S> of Ammiel<S>5988</S>: <sup>Shimea: or, Shammua 2.Sam.5.14.</sup> <sup>Bathshua: or, Bathsheba 2Sam.11.13.</sup> <sup>Ammiel: or, Eliam 2.Sam.11.3.</sup>
Ibhar<S>2984</S> also, and Elishama<S>476</S>, and Eliphelet<S>467</S>, <sup>Elishama: or, Elishua 2Sa.5.15.</sup>
And Nogah<S>5052</S>, and Nepheg<S>5298</S>, and Japhia<S>3309</S>,
And Elishama<S>476</S>, and Eliada<S>450</S>, and Eliphelet<S>467</S>, nine<S>8672</S>. <sup>Eliada: or, Beeliada IChro.14.7.</sup>
These were all the sons<S>1121</S> of David<S>1732</S>, beside the sons<S>1121</S> of the concubines<S>6370</S>, and Tamar<S>8559</S> their sister<S>269</S>.
And Solomon's<S>8010</S> son<S>1121</S> was Rehoboam<S>7346</S>, Abia<S>29</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Asa<S>609</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Jehoshaphat<S>3092</S> his son<S>1121</S>, <sup>Abia: or, Abijam I.king.15.1.</sup>
Joram<S>3141</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Ahaziah<S>274</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Joash<S>3101</S> his son<S>1121</S>, <sup>Ahaziah: or, Azariah 2.Chr.22.6.& 21.17.</sup>
Amaziah<S>558</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Azariah<S>5838</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Jotham<S>3147</S> his son<S>1121</S>, <sup>Azariah: or, Uzziah 2.king.15.30.</sup>
Ahaz<S>271</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Hezekiah<S>2396</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Manasseh<S>4519</S> his son<S>1121</S>,
Amon<S>526</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Josiah<S>2977</S> his son<S>1121</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Josiah<S>2977</S> were, the firstborn<S>1060</S> Johanan<S>3110</S>, the second<S>8145</S> Jehoiakim<S>3079</S>, the third<S>7992</S> Zedekiah<S>6667</S>, the fourth<S>7243</S> Shallum<S>7967</S>. <sup>Johanan: or, Jehochaz 2.kin.23.30.</sup> <sup>Jehoiakim: or, Eliakim 2.kin.23.34.</sup> <sup>Zedekiah: or, Mathaniah.2.kin.24.17.</sup>
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Jehoiakim<S>3079</S>: Jeconiah<S>3204</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Zedekiah<S>6667</S> his son<S>1121</S>. <sup>Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin 2kin.24.6, Zedekiah: or Coniah ier.22.24</sup>
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Jeconiah<S>3204</S>; Assir<S>617</S>, Salathiel<S>7597</S> his son<S>1121</S>, <sup>Salathiel: Heb. Shealtiel</sup>
Malchiram<S>4443</S> also, and Pedaiah<S>6305</S>, and Shenazar<S>8137</S>, Jecamiah<S>3359</S>, Hoshama<S>1953</S>, and Nedabiah<S>5072</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Pedaiah<S>6305</S> were, Zerubbabel<S>2216</S>, and Shimei<S>8096</S>: and the sons<S>1121</S> of Zerubbabel<S>2216</S>; Meshullam<S>4918</S>, and Hananiah<S>2608</S>, and Shelomith<S>8019</S> their sister<S>269</S>:
And Hashubah<S>2807</S>, and Ohel<S>169</S>, and Berechiah<S>1296</S>, and Hasadiah<S>2619</S>, Jushabhesed<S>3142</S>, five<S>2568</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Hananiah<S>2608</S>; Pelatiah<S>6410</S>, and Jesaiah<S>3470</S>: the sons<S>1121</S> of Rephaiah<S>7509</S>, the sons<S>1121</S> of Arnan<S>770</S>, the sons<S>1121</S> of Obadiah<S>5662</S>, the sons<S>1121</S> of Shechaniah<S>7935</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Shechaniah<S>7935</S>; Shemaiah<S>8098</S>: and the sons<S>1121</S> of Shemaiah<S>8098</S>; Hattush<S>2407</S>, and Igeal<S>3008</S>, and Bariah<S>1282</S>, and Neariah<S>5294</S>, and Shaphat<S>8202</S>, six<S>8337</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Neariah<S>5294</S>; Elioenai<S>454</S>, and Hezekiah<S>2396</S>, and Azrikam<S>5840</S>, three<S>7969</S>. <sup>Hezekiah: Heb. Hiskijah</sup>
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Elioenai<S>454</S> were, Hodaiah<S>1939</S>, and Eliashib<S>475</S>, and Pelaiah<S>6411</S>, and Akkub<S>6126</S>, and Johanan<S>3110</S>, and Dalaiah<S>1806</S>, and Anani<S>6054</S>, seven<S>7651</S>.
